Good morning.
I have been advised that a separate matter has been filed in Barren Circuit Court, presumably arising out of the same facts.  I further understand your firm initiated that action.  Can you confirm my understanding, and if so, do you agree the matters should be consolidated?  I presume there is a difference in damages (one in district, one in circuit), but I believe judicial economy might dictate consolidation.  Also, has an answer been filed in the matter you initiated?

Aaron Whaley confirmed that they are following up on a legal case involving clients Deborah Marshall and Jasmine Reed, previously handled by Bryce, who has since left the firm.
Ross confirmed that they have taken the deposition of Jasmine Reed and acknowledged the need for medical records to evaluate the case further.

Aaron Whaley agreed to send all relevant records and bills to Ross to facilitate the review and mediation scheduling.
